projects.name: underground_universal_web_app
projects.title: Underground Universal Web App
projects.description: Designed and built a comprehensive and highly-functional web application for underground musical artists, enabling them to create user-authenticated accounts, manage their profiles, discover, collaborate, and share with fellow artists on a visually captivating interface and user-friendly platform.

projects.name: record_label_landing_page
projects.title: Record Label Landing Page
projects.description: Developed the landing page for Underground Universal, a record label dedicated to providing artists complete royalty control while offering a range of services, showcasing a website that is concise and engaging while displaying the record label's dignified values.

projects.name: diffusion_board_creator
projects.title: Diffusion Board Creator
projects.description: Created a web application enabling users to curate and personalize their preferred online content, offering the convenience of utilizing a Chrome extension or manually adding URLs to organize blog posts, tweets, YouTube videos, and more into custom boards, engaging seamless sharing with friends.

projects.name: web3_discovery
projects.title: Web3 Discovery
projects.description: Developed a Web3 discovery application facilitating effortless exploration of 50+ blockchain companies and platforms, offering dynamic filtering, search, and detailed insights into our database.

projects.name: whac_a_NFT
projects.title: Whac-a-NFT
projects.description: Seamlessly integrated NFTs into an play-to-earn blockchain game reminiscent of Whac-a-Mole, allowing users to showcase their digital assets while also providing access to on-chain leaderboards to track player scores.

projects.name: twitter_react_app
projects.title: Twitter React App
projects.description: Engineered a replica of the Twitter web app using React, featuring essential post, like, and retweet functionalities within a visually identical and responsive user interface, designed for optimal performance across all devices.

projects.name: pizza_ordering_app
projects.title: Pizza Ordering App
projects.description: Explored basic developement through building one of my first personal projects, a Java Swing application for streamlined pizza ordering.

projects.name: dont_get_hit_by_the_hay
projects.title: Don't Get Hit By The Hay
projects.description: Dove into my first ever personal project and created a platform type game, written in Python, where you try to avoid falling objects.
